## Making predictions

For the dengue data, our fitted logistic regression model is

$$\log \left(\dfrac{\widehat{p}_i}{1 - \widehat{p}_i}\right) = 1.737 - 0.361 \ WBC_i$$

1. What is the predicted *odds* of dengue for a patient with a white blood cell count of 15?

\vspace{5cm}

2. What is the predicted *probability* of dengue for a patient with a WBC of 15?
